reflection.what_was_done: Created dental clinic landing page (clinic.html) with Vanta.js Waves, Spectral+Lato typography, light purple design system. Deployed to Cloudflare Pages at bangkokdental.pages.dev. Captured full-page screenshot via Playwright verifying page renders correctly.
reflection.key_insight: Cloudflare Pages deployment requires creating a separate deploy directory with index.html (not clinic.html) for root URL access. Use wrangler pages project create then wrangler pages deploy with --branch main for production.
